mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select distinct dongName, dongCode from dongcode where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName

select d. no, h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.dongCode, si.sidoName, gu.gugunName, h.dongName, h.buildYear, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, h.img, d.dealAmount, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor from houseinfo h inner join housedeal d on h.aptCode = d.aptCode left join sidocode si on left(h.dongCode,2) = left(si.sidoCode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongCode,5) = left(gu.gugunCode,5) where dongCode = #{dong} order by aptName
